title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Sexual and Reproductive Health in the UK
purpose: To promote awareness and understanding in Parliament of a range of issues relating to women’s reproductive health across the life course.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 6865.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Emily Batchelor, College of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare
contact_details.secretariat: College of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.cosrh.org/

detailed_benefits.Source: College of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare (formerly the Faculty of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare)
detailed_benefits.Description: College of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare is funded by the following to act as the group's secretariat: Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists, MSI Reproductive Choices, Bayer Healthcare, and Organon Pharma (UK) Limited. From: 29/10/2024 To: 28/10/2025
